nodes.text: Sai'torr Kal Fas was a Saurin active during the Galactic Civil War. When local farm boy Luke Skywalker and Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi arrived at Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina  arrived looking for a pilot to bring them to the planet Alderaan Fas was there.

While unamed at first Sai'torr Kal Fas first appeared in the 1977 film Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. The name was confirmed as canon in the 2013 video game Star Wars: Force Collection, which predated the 2014 reboot. Though it has not been confirmed in canon, in the Star Wars Legends continuity Fas is the cousin and bodyguard of fellow Saurin Hrchek Kal Fas.
